option.name: content
option.value: Avoid overly verbose descriptions or unnecessary details. point features by "-"like - feature1: make cool logo - feature2: ... also point fixed bugs, optimizations and modifications in this style

list.name: Changes
list.comment: - feat: enhance KioskSettingsPage with UART and device management - Added `refreshDevicesAndPorts` function to handle simultaneous device and port updates. - Implemented `watch` to dynamically fetch ports when UART section expands. - Modified `refreshDeviceStatus` to include port suggestions fetching. - Updated affected button actions and added missing imports. - Updated IDE metadata (`workspace.xml`) for recent changes.

task.summary: - docs: add `modules.md` to document available simple-keyboard modules. - feat: create `StatusCard.vue` component with prop defaults and scoped styles. - feat: implement `useAppStore` Pinia store for templates, versions, and system metrics. - feat: develop `VersioningService` to manage version files. - feat: introduce `DeviceRegistryService` for handling RS-485 and peripheral device data. - feat: add `EventBusService` for in-memory event broadcasting. - chore: set up initial database migrations in `migrations.py`.
- chore: refine `.gitignore` to exclude all files under `.idea/`. - chore: update IDE metadata in `.idea/workspace.xml` configuration.

- chore: remove unused template files (`default.json`, `README.md`) from `templates`. - feat: add new deployment scripts `deploy_orangepi.sh`, `install_apt_deps.sh`, `install_crontab_start.sh`, and `stat.sh` for production setup. - feat: introduce dynamic configuration loading in `config.py` using environment variables. - feat: modify `main.py` to use dynamic environment-based configuration. - chore: update IDE metadata (`workspace.xml`) to reflect recent file changes.

- feat: add Node.js version check in `stat.sh` and update dependency instructions. - Ensure Node.js >= 18 is installed before frontend build. - Add guidance for Node.js installation in `install_apt_deps.sh`.
- feat: add UI access info in `stat.sh` and root URL redirection in FastAPI app - Display frontend UI access URL in `stat.sh`. - Redirect root ("/") to `/app` in the FastAPI server.

- feat: add app update functionality and fix default frontend directory path - Introduced `update` command in `stat.sh` to stop app, fetch updates, rebuild, and restart. - Updated frontend's default `dist_dir` to `frontend/dist/spa` in `config.py`.

- feat: enhance frontend integration and static asset serving - Add `FRONTEND_DIST` environment variable for configurable frontend `dist` path in scripts. - Update FastAPI server to mount static assets at root (`/`). - Remove unused root URL redirection (`/` to `/app`).

- feat: implement mode persistence and redirection in router - Add `LAST_MODE_KEY` for storing the last mode in localStorage. - Introduce `normalizeMode` and `ensureMode` functions to handle mode transitions. - Add `beforeEach` navigation guard to persist mode and handle redirections. - Remove `/app` from UI access URL in `stat.sh` for consistency.

- chore: optimize imports in Vue router setup - Use `type` import for `NavigationGuardNext` and `RouteLocationNormalized` in `router/index.ts`. - fix: handle graceful websocket cancellation in server - Add log message for asyncio task cancellation in `server.py`. - Improve robustness during shutdown by catching `asyncio.CancelledError`.

- fix: clean query parameters in Vue router redirection - Remove redundant `params` property to avoid unintended side effects during navigation. - Adjust `next` call for cleaner redirection logic in `router/index.ts`. - chore: update IDE metadata (`workspace.xml`) to reflect file changes.

- fix: improve API base URL resolution - Add fallback for parsing errors when `VITE_API_BASE_URL` is invalid. - Ensure localhost handling aligns with host origin for improved consistency. - Clean up logic for constructing dynamic API base URLs.
- fix: simplify error handling for API base URL parsing - Remove unused error variable in `axios.ts` fallback logic.

- feat: add polkit Wi-Fi control configuration and improve mode handling - Introduced `polkit` command in `stat.sh` to configure polkit rules for Wi-Fi control. - Updated Vue router redirection logic with `isKioskRoute` helper for cleaner mode handling. - Enhanced `KioskLayout` to support switching from kiosk to desktop mode. - Improved Wi-Fi error handling in backend to detect and report polkit authorization issues. - Updated IDE metadata (`workspace.xml`) for recent file changes.

- feat: add polkit Wi-Fi control configuration and improve mode handling - Introduced `polkit` command in `stat.sh` to configure polkit rules for Wi-Fi control. - Updated Vue router redirection logic with `isKioskRoute` helper for cleaner mode handling. - Enhanced `KioskLayout` to support switching from kiosk to desktop mode. - Improved Wi-Fi error handling in backend to detect and report polkit authorization issues. - Updated IDE metadata (`workspace.xml`) for recent file changes.

- feat: enhance KioskKeyboard and password dialog responsiveness - Adjusted paddings, widths, and font sizes for improved layout scalability. - Introduced `clamp()` for adaptive sizing of keyboard buttons and height. - Enhanced mobile-specific styles for password dialog with flexible layout and transitions. - Updated IDE metadata (`workspace.xml`) to reflect recent changes.

- feat: enhance KioskSettingsPage with network and UART management - Added collapsible sections for network and UART configuration. - Introduced UART port management with add, edit, and delete capabilities. - Improved mobile-specific styling and transitions for settings page. - Updated IDE metadata (`workspace.xml`) for recent changes.

- feat: add KioskKeyboardField component - Introduced `KioskKeyboardField` for enhanced input field interaction with virtual keyboard support. - Integrated feature to open a dialog with keyboard and quick selection options on input focus. - Added props for customizable input behavior such as `layout`, `maxlength`, `suggestions`, and more. - Implemented scoped styles for responsive and adaptive design.

- feat: enhance KioskSettingsPage with UART and device management - Added `refreshDevicesAndPorts` function to handle simultaneous device and port updates. - Implemented `watch` to dynamically fetch ports when UART section expands. - Modified `refreshDeviceStatus` to include port suggestions fetching. - Updated affected button actions and added missing imports. - Updated IDE metadata (`workspace.xml`) for recent changes.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: - feat: enhance KioskSettingsPage with UART and device management - Added `refreshDevicesAndPorts` function to handle simultaneous device and port updates. - Implemented `watch` to dynamically fetch ports when UART section expands. - Modified `refreshDeviceStatus` to include port suggestions fetching. - Updated affected button actions and added missing imports. - Updated IDE metadata (`workspace.xml`) for recent changes.
